attributes.action: Mandatory life sentence for all sexual assault crimes
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to get all sexual assault crimes a mandatory life sentence once convicted in court, of you have committed any sexual assault crime ie . Rape,grooming,Internet grooming,peadophiles,downloading images of children under age , taking pictures of under age children,flashing in front of any of the public , if anyone is convicted of these crimes should get at lest 15 years in prison because these crimes are no different than murder
